title: Please can you help me!
content:
I’m not sure what this type face is!! Could someone please help?

Thank you  
Laura

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bc simple mod 1 transparent bg.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110021/http:/typophile.com/files/bc%20simple%20mod%201%20transparent%20bg.jpg) | 65.51 KB |
author: Laura88

comments.content: That’s the one, Interstate Mazda I knew I had used it before! Thank you

You’re welcome.  
BTW. [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110021/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)
